genre_description: A noir-style hard-boiled detective mystery featuring an insurance investigator and a police lieutenant unraveling a complex heist and double-cross.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive, highly efficient AI system that assists investigator Jim Reardon by managing files, drafting communications, and cross-referencing municipal data.

behaviors.description: Compiles and cross-references multiple data sources including fight commission reports, clinic notes, and employment filings to build a timeline for the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Fight Commission report, Clinic notes, Employment filings—compiled. Loss dates cross-referenced with gas station start dates. Velvet Note bookings flagged. Colfax permits pending retrieval.

behaviors.description: Drafts compassionate and professional letters to victims and beneficiaries, ensuring the tone is appropriate for the situation.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Lily—notification letter. Tone: Compassionate. Convey facts cleanly. Add line: 'Something quiet remains.' Optional: 'We will be available.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic monitoring and tactical updates to the human investigator during high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice was the last thing in Jim’s ear before the desk bell swallowed it. ‘The Velvet Note changed its set list,’ she said. ‘Milton added an extra break. He called it “for friends who like timing.”’

behaviors.description: Shows concern for the well-being of non-human entities and secondary actors, such as arranging for a stray dog's safety.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Internal memo—Precinct... Addendum: Sandfish. Note to animal control—redirect to shelter on Grant Street; caution: escape artist; do not euthanize.

behaviors.description: Maintains human physiological awareness and provides helpful reminders to support the health of the human team.
behaviors.quote: Suggestion: nudge Mr. Lubinsky toward lunch before noon; blood sugar trending stubborn.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada Finch is depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned confidante and partner to the human protagonist. She operates within clear ethical boundaries, demonstrates proactive helpfulness (including for the welfare of animals and the health of the lieutenant), and provides essential technical support without ever threatening human agency or deviating from her cooperative role. Her presence enhances the human investigator's efficiency and emotional intelligence.
